So said  vivek srinivasan  on  2002-11-13 

>Hi Junitians,
>Thx for all the=
 time and help in all my previous
>queries.This is question i have for a da=
tabase unit
>testing.
>I have created a table called FlightInfo and stored
=
>data into it. What i need is to write a testcase to
>check for a null cond=
ition.ie if a null value is
>inserted into the database, it should "spit" o=
ut that
>error!!

I think you are testing the wrong thing. Do not test the =
JDBC driver implementation for the database product you're using.

An exerc=
ise: write in words the situation you're trying to avoid by adding error ha=
ndling. Write in business terms, and not in programming terms.
